content.prompt: Concerns over the birth rate trend after 1965 contributed most directly to which of the following political developments in late-twentieth-century Western Europe?

choices.label: Right-wing proposals to restrict immigration from areas outside Western Europe
Liberal attempts to mitigate the effects of poverty in Western Europe
Conservative resistance to greater economic and political integration of Western Europe
Centrist support for the expansion of NATO after the collapse of the Soviet Union

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
